website_summaries.verdict: Long-range, rapid-fire action with 100-round capacity for fast-paced fun. This is a highly reliable motorized blaster.
pros: The 100-round hopper is easy to refill and empties in under 45 seconds
The rounds travel up to 100 feet per second, making this a fast and powerful blaster
cons: The batteries may not last too long, though the Nerf rechargeable battery pack is compatible and will last much longer

customer_reviews.title: they are awesome! Shoot so far and practically non-stop with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these for me and my son...they are awesome! Shoot so far and practically non-stop with the 100 round hopper.. provides hours of fun. Only bad part is picking up all the ammo when you're empty.. Also, consider goggles or face mask as they will hurt if shot in the eye at close range..
customer_reviews.author: RJG

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old LOVES this nerf gun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wild, obviously holds a lot of ammo and they fly. I was worried about the neighborhood kids getting shot by them but they don't hurt and everyone has fun. Honestly, the worst part is picking up when you're done. Serious fun for everyone though.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: needs rechargeable battery pack.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome except that the D batteries don't last long, I now use a 11.1 lipo battery from a airplane and not only does it shoot faster and further and harder the battery lasts much longer and is easily rechargeable.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Plumb

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Fun, and Absolutely Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent job by Hasbro on this one; especially for a stock blaster. The Nemesis is precise, powerful, and super fun to use fresh out of the box. Would definitely recommend the extra $30 or so on the rechargeable battery pack, as in addition to saving money on batteries, it actually improves the performance of the blaster itself. I believe that the Rival Nemesis is 100% worth its (admittedly hefty) pricetag, as I have gotten so much enjoyment out of this blaster, and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons Of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Have a few different Nerf guns (darts, discs, and now yellow balls) ... this is tons of fun and a neat experience from the darts and discs. The auto-fire is pretty cool, but the motor is fairly loud and takes a second to power up (no sneaking up on people). The auto-fire is slightly less powerful than the hand pump Rival guns, but the ability to overwhelm others with multiple shots is pretty awesome. This model seems pretty well made. Clean-up of ammo is always the worst part and these roll everywhere ... buy extra ... a lot of extra ammo.
customer_reviews.author: Kuby

customer_reviews.title: Best nerf gun money can buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This gun is the best. Nerf gun money can buy. It's a little speedy but it is DEFINITELY worth I love this nerf gun. The gun holds up to a 100 rounds and it is super duper accurate and has the best rate of fire out of all of the nerf guns I have seen. Totally recommend !!!
customer_reviews.author: Conway Brelin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would be too much for my 10 year old... It's not! Does it hurt a little, yes. But it's nothing my son and his friends haven't been able to handle. I had him shoot me first, so I know it doesn't hurt that bad. Of course he loves this gun and has a ton of fun with it. It is a pain to pick up all the balls, but that's expected and not much you can do about it. I would absolutely recommend buying the rechargable battery for it. It's worth spending a little extra one time rather than buying huge batteries over and over! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit too powerful
customer_reviews.text: This has worked well so far but it shoots hard. So eye protection is a must and maybe even neck coverage. The balls are small so playing with it outside means you will just lose all of them. Playing inside will unleash a torrent of small projectiles. This has not been as easy to use int he house as the regular nerf darts. These are quality but not very practical for war in the house for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new go to
customer_reviews.text: This made every other gun I own, obsolete. This is not for your 10 year old. This is for jumping out the bushes to scare your dad. This is for chasing your friends out of the house for telling bad jokes. This gun is for showing up to the party with the intent of making everyone else tap out. Because its a hopper loader, the only down side I really see is the occasional need to shake the gun, but if you keep a steady jiggle to it, you can keep them from getting stuck AND look like Scarface while you do it. It IS bulky but almost nothing out can stand up to this gun. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure the nurf gun was worth the 100 dollars, I will have to say that I am impressed. If you want some fun with your grand kids or children this is the thing FOR YOU, get them the hand pump single shot cheapo gun,,,,ha ha,,,,,trust me if it is working right it will fire like 100 feet shooting straight up. GO AHEAD and buy it, nothing to worry about if you want to be top dog of the house...................
customer_reviews.author: Chris Browning

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! Every kids/adult needs one.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 3 of these. Two for kids and one for adult. They all loved them and was a huge hit a Christmas. I would recommend buying nice quality batteries and definitely recommend buying additional balls. They get lost easy. I would suggest this for a little older kids more that younger, gun kind of heavy. Fun Fun Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Asher

customer_reviews.title: Only get with rechargeable batter is my advice
customer_reviews.text: I am amending my first review of one star since i had the most difficult time using the batteries but now that i have the rechargeable pack I am upgrading g it to 4 stars. Works great. But buyer beware! You are better off dropping another 30 dollars for the rechargeable battery- much lighter than 6 D batteries also. Minus a star for the battery problem.
customer_reviews.author: Louie Clarence

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I mean it definitely would've been awesome but the handle was cracked and wobbling off when I received it, and it didn't have any of the nerf balls in the box when it arrived :/
customer_reviews.author: Terren Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This unit looked great on Youtube videos. I bought it just over a month ago and used it once- it was great. Then the second time I attempted to use it, the batteries had died. When I replaced them (checked they were full twice) the unit would not work. TOTAL waste of money- the worst birthday present I ever gave my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: CTBergman

customer_reviews.title: Faulty loading mechanism
customer_reviews.text: The loading mechanism on this gun failed to pull the bullets to fire. Currently in the process of returning this product and getting another. Hopefully the next one will work better! UPDATE - the return process through Amazon was quick and easy. The new gun arrived today. Despite the box looking like it had been opened and returned, the gun appears to be functioning properly.
customer_reviews.author: LindseyRJ

customer_reviews.title: Ugh...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to finally use it after a month of having it and it burned out after about 15 minutes of play. I even bought the rechargeable battery for this thing. Now it shoots about 5 feet ahead to the ground and it curves to the right significantly. Very disappointed with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: edwin gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Broke day after Christmas.  Really poor quality and construction.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. Assembling the gun and putting the batteries in was really difficult--really tight for a 12 year-old. The battery cover was really challenging to insert/lock properly. Then the day after Christmas the automatic loading mechanism stopped working. Really frustrating, especially given the price tag on this thing. If you're looking for a toy to disappoint your kids, this is the one. I'm guessing it will break not that long after most of you purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: sszturma

customer_reviews.title: Beast of Nerf gun!
customer_reviews.text: When stationary, I use the Rhino Fire to keep them away but when I need to go mobile, the Nemesis makes them run!
customer_reviews.author: Lanhoj

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My 9yr old got this toy as a birthday present and loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First one was dead on arrival second one has a little short in it.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had two first one was dead on arrival. Second one was firing great for about two hours then third hour was a short in it. Just a little shake and back at it. So it may be a bit finnicky? Or perhaps Amazon is sending out refurbished goods again without telling folks they are.
customer_reviews.author: L. Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: A unique game changing  weapon.
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and crazy gun. A little heavy. Bigger than what we thought. Easy to load and highly recommend the rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.author: Wallace

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t operate correctly
customer_reviews.text: i have bought this gun twice and both guns somehow don’t work. it’ll make the noise as if it’s charged up about to blast then when i hit the trigger nothing happens. no balls come out, nothing. then it basically just dies (the charge sound stops) and i have to try to tap on the bottom and every which way just to try to get it to work. then it’ll charge up again about to blast, then nothing happens again. poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of Nerf guns from every set, the Rivals are easily more accurate and powerful than the other projectile types. This rifle is the best of the best, add the rechargeable battery and a couple hundred more rounds and you’re set for Nerf war. Absolutely fantastic toy!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Fischer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME, simply amazing, wish I had one of these growing up!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, almost too good to be just a nerf gun. They are heavy with (6) D batteries in there where my 8 yo kids cant hold them up long. They shoot long and sometimes very hard . Please MAKE SURE YOUR KIDS HAVE EYE WEAR AND A FACE MASK WHEN USING THESE. They could easily go right down someones throat and get lodged
customer_reviews.author: G-

customer_reviews.title: Big big toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old, and the poor guy struggles to hold it. It's bulky and heavy and powerful. That being said, my 12 year old uses this as his weapon of choice. The little balls are a mess and get everywhere but the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: AB7105

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best nerf gun ever made!! I destroy all my nephews now even when they gang up on me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Best Nerf gun
customer_reviews.text: So by far this is the best Nerf gun. Instead of having to constantly reload a mag you just open the top hatch and drop a handful into the hopper. They balls shoot very fast so be sure to get a face mask. Because this gun runs on batteries initially, I highly suggest getting the rechargeable battery pack. It'll save you so much time.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old loves it! High speed and accurate. The gun is a bit heavy for him but he says he's building muscle by carrying it around. The balls are hard to find once they're shot and have the potential to break picture frames (speaking from experience!).
customer_reviews.author: Melanie_KSY

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my grandson and it did not shoot the balls very far or forcefully at all. We sent it back thinking it was a faulty product, and this one was the same. Now I have no way to return it and it was very expensive. Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Nerf prevails again!
customer_reviews.text: This was my son's all time favorite toy for Christmas this year. The foam balls do not hurt if you get him by them (but you still don't want to hit someone close up or in the face). So far the gun works really well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Lacks power, misfires and the bullets just blob out of it
customer_reviews.author: Abe Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Son's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This gun is super fun to play with. It is my sons favorite from his numerous Nerf guns. It is super expensive but not your traditional gun.
customer_reviews.author: Derek R. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Rapid fire is rapid dude
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review but only after having to buy the rechargable battery pack did this gun preform as advertised. With out the rechargable battery pack the gun would barley shoot one bullet 10 ft. then the next bullet just barley clears the barrel. Extremely disappointing for my son until we purchased the rechargable battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Beastley1

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Makes me regret any other nerf gun we have ever bought our 10 yo son. This thing is great. Never jams. Accurate. Fun. My son is thrilled with it and I’m impressed. Now I need one of my own to protect myself.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nerf Rival
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it didnt come on time as promised so we missed the event but it works great
customer_reviews.author: Paugh W Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Tons of NERF fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it!!!! Tons of fun, and the size is perfect. Easy to load, easy to install rechargeable battery pack (sold separately). Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Noyb

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for grandson
customer_reviews.text: birthday gift for my grandson - perfect-he loves it as his twin brother also recd one. Grandpa now wants one! Will Santa see this - haha
customer_reviews.author: Randman

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the recharable battery!
customer_reviews.text: Went through 2 other Rivals before we got this one with the rechargeable battery. Works OK with D-cells but noticable difference using the optional rechargeable battery, then it kicks ass!
customer_reviews.author: GCHPRIME

customer_reviews.title: Why it came broken
customer_reviews.text: fortunately my blaster arrived damaged fortunately it’s just cosmetic damage it doesn’t effect the performance blaster is still a beast 😂
customer_reviews.author: NickGDuarte

customer_reviews.title: of course no one can get too comfortable if you do he'll sneak up on you and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson for Christmas. He loves it, of course no one can get too comfortable if you do he'll sneak up on you and shoot you with those little balls. He's having a ball with it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Power House weapon
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my rival collection I recommend getting the rechargable battery to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: I destroyed people with this!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously wrecked people with this. Definitely get the additional battery pack, it makes the gun a lot lighter and more responsive than if you use 8-D batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny

customer_reviews.title: Gun rated dependable is not dependable
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my birthday Aug 12th and one of the pitching wheels stopped spinning Sep 3rd. I like that it holds many rounds and shoots far and fast! It is cool sounding and looking. Me and my brother have daily gun wars🙂
customer_reviews.author: ZKF

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is making me put a headline here
customer_reviews.text: A nerf blaster that in the Rival line; that shoots faster and more accurately- and it holds one hundred rounds? What’s not to love? If this is a blaster you intend to purchase and use frequently, I would suggest picking up the Rival rechargeable battery pack too. It might cost a bit more than the original 6 D batteries, but within two or three changes and those kind of batteries, the rechargeable one would have paid for itself. Besides, the blaster will rev up faster and shot a bit faster with the rechargeable pack than with the D batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped first day out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for father’s. It’s been sitting in my closet for the last 30 days. Finally got to open it today and after maybe 10 minutes, one started started shooting sluggishly and the other stopped shooting at all. So very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dennise V

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time figuring out if it was worth the price. If you don't play with it often, it's not worth it. If your in frequent battles with it, it is worth it. 100 round fully automatic is super fun, especially with fast reloading of just opening a Hopper and dropping ammo in.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Stowers

customer_reviews.title: Mehh
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh.... for $100 all u can do I shove 100 “bullets” in it. No match to its little brother mk-1200
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Gomez

customer_reviews.title: $ NO BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: AT THIS PRICE YOU WOULD THINK THE DARN BATTERY WOULD ALREADY BE INSTALLED $$HA HA HA HA
customer_reviews.author: <3LadyAngel<3

customer_reviews.title: This is the beat blaster on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the street sweeper! Once you back this out on anyone all games are done! Lol. Nice thing is that the price is starting to reduce due to the soon to be release SMG MXI. But this blaster shoots with rapid speed and almost perfect accuracy
customer_reviews.author: Phylicia

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these as gifts for yong teens. These are a huge hit. They take four C batteries and they are great guns. No jamming. Every kid loves this gun.
customer_reviews.author: M. Heiss

customer_reviews.title: Best Nerf gun on the market. Never jams!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it ten stars if I could. This thing is absolutely awesome! Never jams & with the battery pack it can spew out 115ish balls in about 15 seconds. It's accurate for a full Auto Nerf gun. You can hit anything within 50 feet with a small burst. My Son loves it. I would recommend this & I will buy it again because I want one for me!! Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.author: Klm

customer_reviews.title: Not worth what they charge
customer_reviews.text: It tends to work sporadically. For the price I paid I expected it to be made a little better. Sometimes it shoots and sometimes it doesn't .. and it's been like that since it came in
customer_reviews.author: M Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but AMAZINGLY Fun Toy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son for his 9th birthday and it’s amazing! He loves it! The only negative is that it’s really heavy. Definitely not for younger kids as they wouldn’t be able to hold it up shoot. Other than that, it’s definitely a 5 star product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: As far as I know he is having lots of fun with his new Nerf. He collects as many as he can. Loves them all!
customer_reviews.author: S. Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Nerf gun wonderful bonding tool for Father and son
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful Nerf gun. We bought it for our almost 13 year old son and of course he enjoys it but I think Daddy enjoyed it just as much. This is a great "toy" for boys and men alike. Definitely a great bonding toy for Father and son.
customer_reviews.author: New Mom at 45

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it. It is heavy and definitely good for ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it. It is heavy and definitely good for at least a 10+ year old who is on the larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate shooting
customer_reviews.text: This gun is fast, and accurate. It takes a lot of batteries which makes it a little heavy, so I bought the rechargeable battery. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nerf Rival Nemesis
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. A little heavy for me. Fires fast when paired with the Nerf Rechargeable Battery Pack.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER OBIAS

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished trash
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a returned or refurbished item. Not very happy about it. The gun didn’t even work either. My son has a red one already and we tried the batteries and batteries pack that worked just fine in his red gun and then tried them in this “new” blue one and it wouldn’t work at all. Hopefully the one they are sending as a replacement will not be trash like this one was.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great item~
customer_reviews.text: This was a great item for the 14-year-old's birthday nerf-gun party!! Everyone had a great time.
customer_reviews.author: Skittles

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Nerf Gun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I'm grown af but I tote this thing around and light up fools on the reg.
customer_reviews.author: pvq

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea but the gun sat not being used much since Christmas and the batteries are dead...? The batteries were brand new from Amazon, so either the gun drains batteries without using them or amazon batteries suck.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Nerf battle is now no fun for them but great fun for you.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a brute! Shoots perfectly! If you have this in a nerf battle you will win.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M. Banker Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It's a "Blast" - see what I did there!?
customer_reviews.text: It's the best addition to my son's nerf armory yet. Works well. We purchased the additional battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Chapman

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN 🤨
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son as a Christmas present, and it does not work properly. I know things happen, but still.. I am going to try and return it, then I'll update this review and let ya all know what happens.
customer_reviews.author: JennJenn✌

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This gun is the worst! Changed the batteries 3 times thinking it can’t be this weak. The balls dribble out and I missed the return date because I bought ahead as a gift! Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: This nerf gun is amazing! My kids love it and I even want ...
customer_reviews.text: This nerf gun is amazing! My kids love it and I even want to get one for myself. I would definitely recommend it for everyone. The mask is a must because this thing shoots hard.
customer_reviews.author: bigtex128

customer_reviews.title: Low power, inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and both were disappointing and sent back. The first shot out of the barrel is straight and accurate, then the power drop for every shot after is ridiculous. Disappointed to say the least. I recommend getting the smaller 50 Rd capacity version as it is incredible and will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Hawk

customer_reviews.title: The fact that it's battery powered and can shoot a ton of rounds one after the other is great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband - he and my kids get a ton of use out of it. The fact that it's battery powered and can shoot a ton of rounds one after the other is great.
customer_reviews.author: gamergirl

customer_reviews.title: Great for teenagers or adults
customer_reviews.text: Works great, had to take away from my kids because it's too powerful and they were hurting each other with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris opsal

customer_reviews.title: This!
customer_reviews.text: This gun is super fast!!! My kid loves it. It is very heavy & holds 6 D batteries.
customer_reviews.author: J Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys this Nerf gun! It is automatic and either needs several D sized batteries or a battery pack. Has been great for our Nerf wars and will continue to purchase more!
customer_reviews.author: Kessa Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought them for our honeymoon. One of each color and love shooting each other
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t love shooting balls at others. We have changed all our need guns infavor of the nerf rivals. Less jams and easier to load
customer_reviews.author: DeAndre

customer_reviews.title: Nerf
customer_reviews.text: Fun Nerf, more game time with the amount of ammo it holds. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to much from this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Won't shoot more than 1 at a time at high velocity. All following balls just fall out after the 1st. A complete let down. The pump action rival guns are 10x better.
customer_reviews.author: SGT RED

customer_reviews.title: Buy this and shoot all the people
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fun! You can peg so many people with this thing! I would love to have another
customer_reviews.author: keri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a blast to use! Fast rate of fire and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: MTB_Man

customer_reviews.title: Rapid battery drain
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it takes 6 JUMBO D batteries, which drain in less than 10 days if not removed after use (which u need a screwdriver). Product has to be used upright or it wont shoot/operate properly. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: uriel

customer_reviews.title: Best nerf gun ever
customer_reviews.text: It shoots accurately and far rapidly. Bought this for my son and he lit up the first time he shot it. Although batteries are not included, I would recommend this gun.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nemesis is a great pick
customer_reviews.text: Super DOOPER family fun!!!! 🤪🤪🤪ALWAYS wear eye protection. You will lose balls if you play outside. The Prometheus has a much better battery but maybe too heavy for the youngsters. But it makes for the best Nerf gun for all the RAD DADS!! 😎😎😎
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: wear safety glasses
customer_reviews.text: I already got hit in the eye but if you like hard core action this item is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gun!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Nemesis! He now dominates all his friends in need gun wars!
customer_reviews.author: K. Cheng

customer_reviews.title: So much fun but need to stick with safety precautions
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son absolutely loves this nerf gun. As a parent I highly recommend getting goggles for the kids to wear. These balls sting if you are shot close up so set shooting parameters if you want to avoid tears.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bobe

customer_reviews.title: Fun Nerf Gun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this Nerf gun. He couldn't believe how far it shoots!
customer_reviews.author: Bel B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Nerf Blaster!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best Rival blaster Nerf has ever made. High capacity, high rate of fire, and it uses the rechargeable battery, which is very worthwhile if you're not in the modding community. Can't recommend the Nemesis enough!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: This gun did not work right out of the box. Only shot about 10 feet then could only shoot about 4-5 rounds before it ran out of power.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stracensky

customer_reviews.title: Best toy
customer_reviews.text: Son loves playing with this and his friends in the nerf wars.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Bockweg

customer_reviews.title: 9 year old so happy
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it! It's just like how you see in videos. Hes 9 and it's a little heavy, but not enough to make him
customer_reviews.author: Reem

customer_reviews.title: NO ISSUES
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT IT FOR MY NEPHEW FOR XMAS AND HE LOVED IT.
customer_reviews.author: carmen karrasch

customer_reviews.title: Best Rival Fly-Wheel Blaster
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate Rival blaster out so far. Perfect for adults and teenagers. Get the rechargeable battery pack if you're gonna run this in games or for fun.
customer_reviews.author: gwing00

customer_reviews.title: Box was damaged & poorly taped up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 as Christmas gifts & one of them came in a severely damaged box that someone had tried to patch/tape back together!! It didn't make for a nice gift to open!! :( I'm crossing my fingers they're not broken cause they were very expensive & you can't declare war on an unarmed person if the one doesn't work! :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome nerf gun!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and a really good price for what is purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Estrada

customer_reviews.title: The performance of this blaster is amazing! Very precise and has great range
customer_reviews.text: The performance of this blaster is amazing! Very precise and has great range. Only downside is how loud the flywheel track runs when reved up to fire. Definitely not for the stealthy player but other than that one flaw its the best blaster I've seen unmodified.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan DiPasquale

customer_reviews.title: This is so overpowered.
customer_reviews.text: This blaster was great ! It shot fast, it has a massive capacity, and it is super accurate. However, if you are considering buying this i would recommend the nerf rival rechargeable battery pack with it. The standard D alkaline batteries get used up fast, are heavy, and are expensive. Overall, I would recommend this very much.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They broke the first time the kids dropped them at all. They are very heavy for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Overkill Blaster.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Overkill Blaster. The hopper is very convenient for reloading.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Don't like that I needed 6 D batteries but I guess ...
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. Don't like that I needed 6 D batteries but I guess they have the rechargeable battery pack you can buy separately. It has also jammed a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gun Rips
customer_reviews.text: Get four of these and four friends for a great time!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. When I recieved it, it was not in it's original nerf box like the other nerf gun I had ordered. When I put batteries in it, it didn't work whatsoever. I thought maybe the batteries were bad so I bought brand new ones and still nothing. I ended up returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Micmack19

product_meta.title: Nerf Rival Nemesis MXVII-10K, Blue (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingExperience intense head-to-head competition with the precision and power of the Nerf Rival Nemesis MXVII-10K blaster. This fully motorized blaster has a high-capacity hopper that holds up to 100 high-impact rounds. Fill the easy-loading hopper and unleash a blistering blast of rounds at a velocity of 100 feet per second (30 meters per second). The blaster is available in blue and red (each sold separately), so choose a color and go into battle as Team Red or Team Blue. Power it with batteries or the Nerf Rival Rechargeable Battery Pack (batteries not included and battery pack sold separately). Includes 100 high-impact rounds. Experience the intensity of Nerf Rival with the Nemesis MXVII-10K blaster! Nerf and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: This version comes in simple brown packaging
Choose red or blue to battle as Team Red or Team Blue
Experience ultimate precision and intense competition

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
